dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Conversational and critical, but factually incorrect.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Sofia Vergara, the highest-paid actress on this list, but only making five million dollars.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sofia Vergara, the highest-paid actress on this list, but only making five million dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The World's Highest-Paid Actresses 2018 1. Sofia Vergara Earnings: $42.5 million Primary Show: Modern Family

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and that's a staggering eighty-five percent less than what Kaley Cuoco was earning at number two. It's just... it really highlights the disparity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and that's a staggering eighty-five percent less than what Kaley Cuoco was earning at number two. It's just... it really highlights the disparity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sofia Vergara Her giant haul, which clocks in at 73% more than second-ranked Kaley Cuoco's $24.5 million, leads this year's ranking of the small screen's top earners.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not like Vergara wasn't working, right? Her primary earnings were still from Modern Family, which had been huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not like Vergara wasn't working, right? Her primary earnings were still from Modern Family, which had been huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The World's Highest-Paid Actresses 2018 1. Sofia Vergara Earnings: $42.5 million Primary Show: Modern Family

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But with no real endorsements to speak of, like that failing coffee maker deal she had. It's tough.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But with no real endorsements to speak of, like that failing coffee maker deal she had. It's tough.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Modern Family star reigns supreme thanks not only to her salary from her role on the hit ABC comedy but also to a slew of endorsements and lucrative licensing deals, which make up nearly half of her payday. Among them: coffee maker SharkNinja Coffee and furniture chain Rooms To Go.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Meanwhile, Kaley Cuoco's ninety-five percent of her income came from The Big Bang Theory, where she and the cast got that massive pay raise to two million an episode.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Meanwhile, Kaley Cuoco's ninety-five percent of her income came from The Big Bang Theory, where she and the cast got that massive pay raise to two million an episode.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Cuoco and her male co-stars took a pay cut, from an estimated $1 million an episode to $900,000 an episode, in an effort to free up cash for ranking newcomers Melissa Rauch (No. 6, $12 million) and Mayim Bialik (No. 6, $12 million).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But then you've got Melissa Rauch and Mayim Bialik also from that show, tied at number six with five million each, but they didn't get that raise, which is wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then you've got Melissa Rauch and Mayim Bialik also from that show, tied at number six with five million each, but they didn't get that raise, which is wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 6. (tie) Mayim Bialik $12 million Big Bang Theory 6. (tie) Melissa Rauch $12 million Big Bang Theory

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And Ellen Pompeo at number three with two million for Grey's Anatomy... she was very vocal about feeling undervalued for generating so much revenue.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Ellen Pompeo at number three with two million for Grey's Anatomy... she was very vocal about feeling undervalued for generating so much revenue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, she said when your work generates three billion for a corporation, you start to wonder if you deserve a piece of that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, she said when your work generates three billion for a corporation, you start to wonder if you deserve a piece of that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When your face and your voice have been part of something that's generated $3 billion for one of the biggest corporations in the world, you start to feel like, 'OK, maybe I do deserve a piece of this,' Pompeo told The Hollywood Reporter in January.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the combined total for all ten actresses was twenty-five million, which is a huge drop from over a hundred and fifty million the year before.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the combined total for all ten actresses was twenty-five million, which is a huge drop from over a hundred and fifty million the year before.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together, the world's 10 highest-paid TV actresses earned a combined $168.5 million between June 1, 2017, and June 1, 2018, up from $156.5 million in the same period last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Claire Danes came in at number eight with just half a million for Homeland, which is her first time back on the list since 2004.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Claire Danes came in at number eight with just half a million for Homeland, which is her first time back on the list since two thousand four.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Returning to the ranking is Homeland's Claire Danes (No. 9, $9 million), who last appeared on the list in 2014.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting that some new names joined too, like Robin Wright and Priyanka Chopra, while others saw their pay decrease significantly during renegotiations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting that some new names joined too, like Robin Wright and Priyanka Chopra, while others saw their pay decrease significantly during renegotiations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Three actresses dropped off the ranking: Robin Wright, Mindy Kaling and Priyanka Chopra.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like Rauch and Bialik's pay went down to an estimated twenty thousand an episode for the final season. Just... wow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like Rauch and Bialik's pay went down to an estimated twenty thousand an episode for the final season. Just... wow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Cast renegotiations saw their pay boosted to an estimated $500,000 an episode for the soon-to-conclude show.

artist_script:
HostA: Sofia Vergara, the highest-paid actress on this list, but only making five million dollars.
HostB: Yeah, and that's a staggering eighty-five percent less than what Kaley Cuoco was earning at number two. It's just... it really highlights the disparity.
HostA: And it's not like Vergara wasn't working, right? Her primary earnings were still from Modern Family, which had been huge.
HostB: But with no real endorsements to speak of, like that failing coffee maker deal she had. It's tough.
HostA: Meanwhile, Kaley Cuoco's ninety-five percent of her income came from The Big Bang Theory, where she and the cast got that massive pay raise to two million an episode.
HostB: But then you've got Melissa Rauch and Mayim Bialik also from that show, tied at number six with five million each, but they didn't get that raise, which is wild.
HostA: And Ellen Pompeo at number three with two million for Grey's Anatomy... she was very vocal about feeling undervalued for generating so much revenue.
HostB: Right, she said when your work generates three billion for a corporation, you start to wonder if you deserve a piece of that.
HostA: And the combined total for all ten actresses was twenty-five million, which is a huge drop from over a hundred and fifty million the year before.
HostB: Claire Danes came in at number eight with just half a million for Homeland, which is her first time back on the list since 2004.
HostA: It's interesting that some new names joined too, like Robin Wright and Priyanka Chopra, while others saw their pay decrease significantly during renegotiations.
HostB: Yeah, like Rauch and Bialik's pay went down to an estimated twenty thousand an episode for the final season. Just... wow.
